title: Anacostia Park: Fitness Station
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Fitness Station              Fitness Station         The fitness station has equipment for a full-body workout. NPS  A workout with a view! Feel the burn on 18 pieces of strength training and aerobic equipment. Best of all, it's free! Equipment:  Combo press & pull Pull-up and dip station Sit-up boards Seated lat pull Exercise bikes Air strider Squat press Rowing machine Horizontal ladder Accessible multi-gym Push-up bars Horizontal bars Elliptical cross-trainer  The Anacostia Park fitness station was unveiled in 2014. Its construction was made possible through cooperation with the Trust for Public Lands.
